tip_0: Nautilus loses his AOE cleave on his auto attacks if you pop his shield, so try to take it down as soon as possible.
tip_1: Nautilus's Riptide will hit you multiple times if you move away from him, so stay still if you can.
tip_2: Nautilus's ultimate will knock-up any targets in its way to its target, so try not to get in the way.
